t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 12 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: The Strategy Behind Amazon Getting Back Into Mall Pop-Up Stores
s: February 3, 2020 - News broke last week that Amazon has reentered the pop-up retail game. After closing down all of its reported 87 pop-up stores last year, Amazon recently opened 5 new mall-based pop-ups with plans for additional stores later this year.

t: A Look Inside an Amazon Pop-Up
